Text: Thank you for this material. Could you please tell me which program you used to convert the original upload to pdf?

Adobe Acrobat Pro Extended - is used to create the pdf. it has the feature "recognize text using OCR" short for optical character recognition, which can turn a photograph of text into text that can be highlighted for copy/paste or for finding words using search.  Before running the OCR program, I first selected all the individual files that made up the pages and used Acrobat to combine them into a single pdf.  The other post of this had a pretty nice index, but did not include all the words, and then could not copy paste from it.

Hi jsweet777,  I just found your work today and realized that it was based on my upload. :) It must have been a pain putting this together. Nicely done and thanks alot, this is much easier to use and store.

it is sad that the seeding is low.  This is now permanently seeded so that my fellow human beings do not remain in ignorance of the law.  I suggest that you do the same.  This is important and it is your civic duty.  it's worth every bit of space and bandwidth that you spare.
Thank you so much.  I have a need for this book.
